title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker for all your audio needs. With its sleek black design and powerful features, this speaker is perfect for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside parties.

Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio with the Bose SoundLink Flex. Equipped with exclusive technologies like PositionIQ and a custom-engineered transducer, this speaker delivers exceptional sound quality that will elevate your listening experience to new heights.

Not only is the SoundLink Flex designed to provide superior audio, but it is also built to withstand any environment. With its IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker is fully waterproof and even floats on water, making it ideal for poolside use. It is also dust-resistant, shock-resistant, and corrosion-resistant, ensuring that it can handle the rigors of outdoor adventures.

The SoundLink Flex is highly portable, thanks to its compact design and utility loop for easy carrying and storage. No matter where you go, this speaker is always ready to accompany you. Additionally, its long-lasting lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime on a single charge. When it's time to recharge, simply use the included USB-C cable, and in approximately 4 hours, your speaker will be ready to go again.

Stay connected with the built-in microphone, which allows for hands-free calling and easy access to virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant. Control your speaker effortlessly with the Bose Connect App, which offers additional features such as software updates and customizable settings.

With a connectivity range of up to 30 feet, the SoundLink Flex ensures a seamless wireless connection to your devices. Whether you're relaxing by the pool or hosting a backyard BBQ, this speaker will provide the perfect soundtrack to your outdoor gatherings.

Upgrade your audio experience with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Buy now and enjoy the perfect blend of portability, durability, and exceptional sound quality.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker for all your outdoor adventures! This sleek and stylish speaker is designed to provide you with an immersive audio experience wherever you go.

Featuring deep, clear, and immersive audio quality, the Bose SoundLink Flex delivers powerful sound that will elevate your music listening experience. With exclusive technologies like PositionIQ and custom-engineered transducer, you can expect nothing but the best sound performance.

Not only does this speaker sound amazing, but it is also built to withstand the elements. With its IP67 waterproof rating, it is perfect for travel, outdoor activities, and even pool use. Yes, you read that right - it floats on water! It is also dust-resistant, shock-resistant, and corrosion-resistant, so you can take it anywhere without worrying about damage.

The Bose SoundLink Flex is designed with portability in mind. Its compact design and utility loop make it easy to hold and store, while its built-in microphone allows for hands-free calling. Plus, with Siri and Google Assistant access, you can control your speaker with just your voice.

Connectivity is a breeze with Bluetooth technology, and the Bose Connect App provides additional support and customizable settings. The rechargeable lithium-ion battery offers up to 12 hours of playtime, and with the USB-C cable charging method, it will be ready to go in approximately 4 hours.

With a connectivity range of up to 30 feet, you can enjoy your music without being tied down. Whether you're going on a hike, relaxing by the pool, or hosting a backyard party, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is the perfect companion.

Get ready to elevate your music experience and make a statement with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Don't miss out on this incredible portable speaker - order yours today!

With the Bose Connect App, you can customize your audio settings, receive software updates, and enjoy additional features. With a connection range of up to 30 feet, you can enjoy wireless freedom without sacrificing audio quality. The Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is the perfect companion for your travels, outdoor adventures, and poolside relaxation. Get yours today and elevate your audio experience to new heights.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - the ultimate portable speaker that combines convenience, durability, and exceptional audio quality. 

Designed for those who love to travel, enjoy the great outdoors, or simply relax by the pool, this speaker is your perfect companion. With its sleek black design, it adds a touch of elegance to any setting.

Featuring a built-in microphone, you can easily take calls and stay connected wherever you go. The wireless Bluetooth technology ensures seamless connectivity with your devices, allowing you to enjoy your favorite music without any hassle.

The Bose SoundLink Flex is not just any ordinary speaker - it is also completely waterproof with an impressive IP67 rating. Whether you're at the beach or by the pool, you can have peace of mind knowing that your speaker is protected against water damage. It even floats on water, ensuring that your music never gets interrupted.

But that's not all - this speaker is built to withstand the elements. It is dust-resistant, shock-resistant, and corrosion-resistant, making it perfect for outdoor adventures. The UV light resistance ensures that it maintains its sleek black finish even under the sun.

With its powerful lithium-ion battery, you can enjoy up to 12 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge. And when it's time to recharge, simply use the convenient USB-C cable, and it will be ready to go in approximately 4 hours.

The Bose SoundLink Flex also comes with a range of smart features. With the built-in microphone, you can access voice assistants like Siri and Google Assistant with just a voice command. Plus, the Bose Connect App allows you to customize your settings and receive software updates for an enhanced user experience.

This speaker is not just about functionality - it's also incredibly portable. Its compact design makes it easy to carry anywhere, and the utility loop provides added security when you're on the move. And thanks to its durable construction, it can withstand drops and bumps without missing a beat.

Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker. Elevate your music listening experience and make every moment unforgettable. Get yours today and enjoy music like never before.
